title: Instructional Design Scenario for Developing a Sámi Language eBook

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Interactive e-book development project conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: The content structure of the Sasaq Allus language e-book (based on ≥80.5% criteria) can be analyzed to define design requirements
An interactive e-book prototype utilizing multimedia elements (based on ≥81.1% criteria) can be developed
A 4D model-based instructional design principle can be applied to develop e-books verified for learning effectiveness (based on ≥83.1% criteria)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
